preqs: Admission to an Art & Design course, or permission

rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {FNA1201, FNA1211, FNA1222, FNA1301, FNA1303, FNA1304}

proh: FNA1201 or FNA1211 or FNA1222 or FNA1301 or FNA1303 or FNA1304
description: This unit introduces students to the practice and theory of painting as a means of contemporary creative expression. It focuses on raising awareness of and providing the means to achieve an initial level of competence within the painting discipline, while imparting a sound conceptual and technical basis for continuing study in that discipline. The safe handling of materials and equipment is emphasised as an essential part of all studio practice.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
